headline: Goldman Switches Sides on Aviva’s £3.3 Billion Direct Line Bid
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has switched sides to advise Aviva Plc on its £3.3 billion ($4.2 billion) takeover bid for Direct Line Insurance Group Plc, only eight months after helping the target successfully defend against another suitor.Most Read from BloombergIn Traffic-Weary Toronto, a Battle Breaks Out Over Bike LanesIn Italy’s Motor City, Car-Free Options Are GrowingNew York City’s ‘Living Breakwaters’ Brace for Stormier SeasThe New York-based investment bank — with a team led b

headline: Independent Advisor Solutions forges alliance with Goldman Sachs
summary: This move follows last month's launch of Independent Advisor Solutions and the "MiBLOX" collaboration with BlackRock.

headline: What Trump’s Immigration Plans Mean for America’s Job Growth
summary: Surging unauthorized migration swelled the labor force. Deportations and tighter border controls could change that.

headline: Retail Investors Are Key to Sustaining China’s Stock-Market Rally
summary: Retail investors in China shied away from stocks as markets dropped in 2022 and 2023, but they’ve been roused awake this year by Beijing’s efforts to bolster the economy.

raw.headline: Retail Investors Are Key to Sustaining China’s Stock-Market Rally
raw.summary: Retail investors in China shied away from stocks as markets dropped in 2022 and 2023, but they’ve been roused awake this year by Beijing’s efforts to bolster the economy.
